Text: ANNOUNCEMENT Roger Espinoza Cc Jim Suttle and I in welcoming Roger Espinoza to the EOTT PLP team effective June Roger will be part of the Midland area Pipeline Scheduling team reporting to Jim as Stream Quality Manager West Texas and New Mexico With Rogers experience in the industry and his familiarity with the EOTT assets in West Texas and New Mexico we expect him to bring substantial value to PLP and EOTT Energy He will spearhead our Quality Management Program an initiative designed to ensure onspec quality coupled with the maintenance of the commercial value of the stream in our pipeline systems
